Welcome to Inspestor!
Here are some instructions when using Inspestor.
ZOOM
When capturing tiny insect pest, it is advised to zoom in.
FOCUS
Make sure that the camera is focused to the insect pest and have a proper lighting.
light
proper lighting
thank you
liat ------------ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- How to identify insect using Inspestor Instructions to use our app: 1. To accurately detect insect pests,place the insect at the center of the camera preview and zoom in if possible. The lighting should not be directed to the insect,and the camera should focus on the insect. 2. Click on the camera button to capture the insect pest or the gallery to upload an image. 3. After capturing/uploading, click OK to process the image. 4. Inspestor will provide results of the kind of insect pest and then recommend generic pesticides for users to eliminate insect pests. \nFor further information about the insect pest you can click the result box. Your insect pest detector for rice fields.
